metadata.description:
Originally published in 2020, this is a revival of a classic work of the metaverse.
The image has been showcased across syndicate television, streaming into millions of homes, and was one of the first "NFT" images seen and widely recognized.  It in essence was one of the images that began the NFT craze and excitement of 2021

Original Painting, 25" x 38" oil and wax on canvas, with MEMEs, it is a comment on the current state of our human condition.
The work also reflects the artist's condition-->recent hack, stolen from, destruction, and rebirth in reminting and a brand new coded authentic COMIC contract.
Welcome to the future, 2020-2022.

Original public record: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x6e30bfa8891e333428be82ca5f9d98b2ddfcba90024368ac10e02f1d7cc12a0e
528 days 22 hrs ago (at this minting date of 9/2/22) (Mar-22-2021 11:34:36 PM +UTC)
Transaction Action:
Mint of BigComicArt(COMIC)
